name: Nature-Cyber Hybrid Avatar #63
description: Presenting an exclusive collectible from the RPine DEX aggregator ecosystem, this avatar beautifully fuses nature with advanced technology. With a moss-infused neck implant, a headpiece adorned with blooming flowers, and glowing cybernetic elements, it embodies a harmony between organic life and technological advancement. Own this digital masterpiece and unlock special privileges within the RPine ecosystem.

attributes.value: Natural green with flowers and moss
Nature-infused armor with moss and tech elements
Bright green with glowing cybernetic implants
Soft sunlight filtering through a forest
Lush green forest with gentle sunlight
Integrated bio-circuitry with moss and flowers
